resources.string: Everyone has a innertalent and innervoice which they want to express. Some express through words and some by singing.This app is designed for those.It is a Karaoke app that is used for singing practice.In this app,You have a facitlity to listen the whole track and record it separately.Lyrics will be displayed on the screen while singing.You can listen the karaoke track many times without recording,and can record the song when ever you are familiar with the tune. All THE BEST!!!
